sourceMeaningMnemonic: You take some <radical>gold</radical> and cover your <radical>yoga</radical> <radical>brush</radical> in it, turning it into a <kanji>key</kanji>. You shove the brush you normally use for yoga into the lock to your car and pour the gold over it. Now it's the right shape to be a key!
meaningInfo: You lost your old key, you see. But you're a go with the flow type of person, thanks to all the yoga, so you make a new one!
readingMnemonic: This <kanji>key</kanji> has to be perfect, because if it isn't the <reading>ca</reading>r <reading>gui</reading>llotine (<ja>かぎ</ja>) will come down and chop off your hand!
readingInfo: Imagine carefully putting your makeshift key into your car's lock. You close your eyes and pray that the car guillotine isn't going to trigger, knowing it isn't a legit key.
